description: All I can say is WOW this is a great peace of software and I completely recommend it as a ACAD replacement for 2D drafting. The 3D functions are still not there but the 2D is completely up to standards. The software does take a bit of configuring but so does ACAD. I hardest thing for me is the naming of tools is a bit different. Osnap vs. Esnap. Give it a try!
summary: The best and darn close to ACAD for 2D

description:
I use linux, so I was needing a dwg editor to make my homeworks for college.
It works very well for me, the app has some limitations, I believe it is because I use the free version. It is a good alternative to the AutoCAD for who has a old computer, or use Linux.
user_display: Raphael Masson de Abreu e Souza
